verbs.description: developmental twist intrigues [V: heat] [ARG0: mcgruder] if there is a single team in the nba that stands as a testament to the value of the nba g league it well might be the miami heat nearly half the roster has spent time with the sioux falls skyforce with two - way players duncan robinson and yante maten about to head there and yet when it came to this past week announcement that the g league next year will begin a program next season that will offer five - month 125 000 select contracts to 18-year - old prep prospects who d league ira winderman miami nba g league rodney mcgruder sioux falls skyforce national basketball association nba summer league
